SELECT n.`notictop`,n.`noticcontent`,n.`createtime`, u.`username` publishUser,n.`corid`,u1.`username` receiveUser FROM `notic` n LEFT JOIN `sys_user` u ON n.`notictuserid` = u.`user_id` LEFT JOIN `sys_user` u1 ON n.`noticteduserid` = u1.`user_id`
AND u.`username` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pd.publishUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND n.`corid` = #{pd.corId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND u1.`username` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pd.receiveUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND n.`createtime` between date_format(#{pd.startTime},'%Y%m%d') AND date_format(#{pd.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
